name: CRM Backend - Node.js + Prisma + PostgreSQL
postCreateCommand: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y postgresql postgresql-client && sudo service postgresql start && sudo -u postgres psql -c "CREATE DATABASE crm_db;" 2>/dev/null || true && sudo -u postgres psql -c "ALTER USER postgres WITH PASSWORD 'postgres';" 2>/dev/null || true && cd crm-backend && npm install && npx prisma generate
